/>
Introduction
This topic contains information about definitions related to duty to notify and duty to assist, including
definition of relevant records
refraining from or discontinuing assistance
claims that are inherently incredible or lack merit
, and
definition of
competent medical evidence
competent lay evidence
substantially complete application
event
information
an initial claim
a supplemental claim
, and
reopened claim
.
title: M21-1, Part I, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - Description and General Information on Duty to Notify and Duty to Assist
citation: Part I, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A
